alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Le Flore; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 11:25PM CDT until May 03 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Pushmataha County in southeastern Oklahoma... Choctaw County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southern Le Flore County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1124 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles east of Nashoba to 2 miles southeast of Boswell, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Hugo... Antlers... Boswell... Fort Towson... Sawyer... Rattan... Soper... Octavia... Big Cedar... Hugo Lake State Park... Whitesboro... Kent... Goodland... Messer... Raymond Gary State Park... Muse... Oleta... Cloudy... Grant... Ord... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
